sourcesContent:
import React, {Component} from 'react' import Modal from 'react-modal'; import { formatCNPJ, formatCPF, translateStatus } from '../helpers/FormatDocument'; const customStyles = { content : { top : '50%', left : '50%', right : 'auto', bottom : 'auto', width: 500, marginRight : '-50%', transform : 'translate(-50%, -50%)' } }; class ModalDetails extends Component { constructor() { super() this.state = { modalIsOpen: false } } handleModal = () => this.setState({modalIsOpen: !this.state.modalIsOpen}) render() { const { modalIsOpen, document, query, loadSpin } = this.props console.log("document", document) return

Detalhes da pesquisa

{loadSpin === true ?
:
Buscou: {query}
{Object.keys(document).length > 0 &&
{typeof document.cpf !== "undefined" ? "CPF": "CNPJ"}: {typeof document.cpf !== "undefined" ? formatCPF(document.cpf): formatCNPJ(document.cnpj)}
Situação: {translateStatus(document.status)}
Ultima atualização: {document.updated_at}
Registrado em: {document.created_at}
}
} } } export default ModalDetails;
